attributes.action: Move  Middleton  St  George/One  Row ,  Hurworth,  Sadberge &  Neasham,  out  of  the  Sedgefield  political  constituancy  into  the  Darlington  constituancy.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Move  Middleton  St  George/One  Row ,  Hurworth,  Sadberge &  Neasham,  out  of  the  Sedgefield  political  constituancy, &  into  the  Darlington  constituancy. The residents of these  villages pay council tax etc to Darlington Borough Council, yet our votes are not counted for the Darlington  MP,  but for the  election  of  the  Sedgefield  MP ( currently T Blair ). Darlington &  its  villages heritage is railways, market town, rural affairs,  not  like Sedgefield's history  of coal mining / coke works etc.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
